info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:39PM MDT until June 03 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN YUMA COUNTY... At 639 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 17 miles southwest of Wray, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Beecher Island and Vernon. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 217 and 233. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
